groups.thesis_breaker: S&P 500 correction below 6302 (10% off 7002 high). Momentum breakdown if avg RSI drops below 40 (currently 47). Trend weakening — 1/3 (33%) already below 50-day MA, critical if >50%. Leadership lost if group avg YTD turns negative (currently +5.5%).
